scripts.dist: tsc -p tsconfig.publish.json -outDir build && npm run copy-dist
scripts.dev: npm run clean-build && tsc -p tsconfig.publish.json -outDir build && shx cp package.json build
scripts.dev-test: npm run clean-build && tsc -p tsconfig.json && npm run test
scripts.clean: npm run clean-src && npm run clean-test
scripts.clean-src: shx rm -rf src/**/*.js src/**/*.js.map src/**/*.d.ts *.d.ts *.js *.js.map server common objio client object
